createDiagrams.title: Kokela diagrammes
createDiagrams.prompt: Lakisa ngai ndenge okoki kokela diagramme na flowchart. Makambo nini, misala, to systemes nini okoki kosalisa ngai na kokombola? Pesa ndakisa.

draftContent.title: Kokoma biloba ya profeshonel
draftContent.prompt: Nalingi lisungi na kokoma mikanda ya profeshonel - email, rapport, r√©sum√©. Okoki kolakisa ngai ndenge okoki kosalisa ngai na makambo ekeseni ya kokoma profeshonel?

analyzeInformation.title: Lendisa Makambo
analyzeInformation.prompt: Ndenge nini okoki kosalisa ngai na kolendisa ba donn√©es to makambo? Lakisa ngai ndenge ndenge nini okoki kokabola ba n…îÃÅmbre, koluka bapatikana ya makambo, to kobimisa biyano uta na ndakisa to ba documents.

planOrganize.title: Planifier & Kobongisa
planOrganize.prompt: Okoki kosalisa ngai na koplannifier ba projets to kobongisa mosala? Pesa ngai ba ndakisa ya ndenge okoki kosala timelines, agendas, to ba project plan na misaleli ndenge na ndenge.

brainstormIdeas.title: Kobondela Bina√Øsosolo
brainstormIdeas.prompt: Nalingi koluka bitaleli ya kobongola likambo moko. Lakisa ngai ndenge bososoli na yo ezali ya kobimisa makanisi, ba motuna nini okotuna mpe ndenge nini okopesa bisaleli ya sika.

buildPresentations.title: Kosala Ba Pr√©sentations
buildPresentations.prompt: Ndenge nini okoki kosalisa ngai nasala ba presentation? Lakisa ngai ba ndakisa ya ndenge ndenge ya presentation, ba ndakisa ya bililingi, mpe ndenge nini obongisa makambo mpo na ba bato babongi.

workWithCode.title: Kosala na Code
workWithCode.prompt: Okoki kosalisa na coding to na scripts? Lakisa ngai ba ndakisa‚Äîsoki ezali kokoma code ya sika, kokata makambo, to kolimbola ndenge eloko ezali kosala mbala na mbala.

decisionSupport.title: Kobongisa Makambo ya Kozwa Ekano
decisionSupport.prompt: Nabiso ekano moko kasi nayebi te ndenge nini nakotala ba mayele. Okoki kolakisa ngai ba systeme to ba metodologie okosalelaka mpo na kosalisa na kopesa ekano?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Kosangisa & Kokitisa Makambo na Mokuse
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: Ndenge nini okoki kosalisa na kokitisa ba documents molayi to kosangisa makambo esika moko na bisika ndenge na ndenge? Lakisa ngai ba ndakisa ya ndenge ndenge ya r√©sum√© mpe ndenge na ndenge ya molai ya bisaleli.

explainTopics.title: Kolemba Makambo Maluku
explainTopics.prompt: Okoki kolimbola makanisi makasi na maloba pepele? Lakisa ngai ndenge okabola makanisi, kosalela ba analogie mpe ndenge okotya maloba pona bato na bozindo ya boyebi ndenge na ndenge.

createSchedules.title: Kosala Ba Programme ya Mikolo
createSchedules.prompt: Nalingi kosalisama na kobongisa tango mpe kosala programme. Lakisa ngai ndenge ndenge ya kosala agendas, kalandriye, to plan ya tango na ba ndakisa.

agents.description: Kosalela mpe kobatela ba agent ya AI ya bobongisami na makoki ya mayele. Ba agent oyo basalaka na MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance.

agents.noAgentsDescription: S√°la agent na yo ya liboso mpo na kobakisa makoki ya AI na ba outils mpe comportements oyo ebongisami.

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: Mod…õl…õ AI ya GPT-4.1 oyo ekoki koluka makambo ya sika na bing. Epesi makambo ya mikolo, kokanga solo, mpe koyeba makambo ya mokili. Malamu mpo na bolukiluki esengaka lisusu sika, kotalela sango, mpe kokanga solo.
gpt_4_1.knowledgeCutoff: Kofungola Internet na tango ya sik‚Äôoyo

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: Mod…õl…õ ya OpenAI oyo eleki nyonso, elongi na makanisi makasi, kotonga kode, mpe kobongisa mituna ya technique. Malamu mpo na misala ya analyse, mikakatano ya programmation, bolukiluki, mpe polele ya minoko. Esalelaka makanisi makasi na ndenge batu balingi mpe motindo ya biyano.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Esalemi mpo ekende noki mpe elia mbongo moke koleka GPT-5, kasi ezali qualit√© mingi. Ebongi mpo na misala ya mokolo na mokolo, mituna ya noki, kotinda na bitulolo, mpe misala esengaka biyano ya noki. Elakisa bosangani ya mosala malamu mpe elamu.

gpt_5_2_chat.name: GPT-5.2 Chat
gpt_5_2_chat.description: Mod…õl…õ ya GPT-5.2 esalelami mpo na kosolola na batu mpe kokanga makanisi. Elongi na kosolola na moyekoli, kosunga na makanisi na motema, kotonga maloba, koluka makanisi mapya, mpe kotambola na dialoge naturel. Ebongi mpo na kosolola ya mikili, kobatela makanisi ya motema, mpe misala esengaka kokanga makanisi.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: Mod…õl…õ ya reasoning ya OpenAI oyo eleki na solution ya mikakatano. Eleki malamu na math√©matique ya pasi, makanisi ya science, mikakatano ya kode, mpe misala ya logique mingi. Esaleli contexte ya 200K. Esalelaka makanisi na ndenge bato balingi.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Mod…õl…õ ya Meta ekendaka noki mpe elia mbongo moke. Ebongi mpo na misala ya mokolo na mokolo lokola kokoma, kosangisa, mpe kosunga na base ya kode. Elakisa kokende noki mpe qualit√© malamu mpo na misala ya mbala na mbala.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Mok‰∏ìÂÆ∂ ya makanisi oyo alakisaka mosala na ye etape na etape. Ebongi mingi mpo na mikakatano ya math√©matique, bafungola logique, mpe koyeba makambo pasi. Tala ndenge anakanisaka likambo na tango ya sik‚Äôoyo.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Mod…õl…õ makasi ya kosala misala nyonso, mingimingi kod√© mpe kokoma na technique. Malamu mpo na kobongisa kode, kokoma documentation, mpe kolimbola makambo ya technique. Ezali noki mpe ndeko mpo na misala ya d√©veloppement.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Model ya xAI oyo ebongi na ba ekiseli ya ndenge na ndenge. Eleki malamu mpo na masolo ya kofungola, misala ya bokeli, mpe mituna makasi.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Model ya Anthropic oyo ezali na makoki mingi ya kokanisa, kotanga code, mpe misala ya bokeli. Epesaka eyano malamu na bisaleli ya boyekoli mpe ba analyses ya pasi.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Model ya Claude oyo ezalaka na bokasi na misala na yango nyonso. Eleki malamu mpo na misala ya mokolo na mokolo na eyano ya nokinoki.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Model ya liboso ya Claude Opus. Ebongi malamu mpo na misala ya code ya pasi, analyse ya ndenge na ndenge mpe koyeba bisika mingi.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Model ya Claude ya nokinoki mpe ya motuya ya moke mpo na misala ya nokinoki. Eleki malamu mpo na mituna ya pete, ko zipa makambo, mpe ba application ya mingi.

searchMode.subtitle: Koyeba makambo ya ba options ya koluka mpe esika ba donn√©es na yo ezalaka
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Eyano ya mbangu koleka, kasi koluka na web te. Lisolo na yo mobimba ezali kaka na browser na yo ‚Äî eloko moko te ebombama na cloud.

searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: Oyo ezali ba modes ya koluka oyo ekoki kosalema nsima ya Azure kolongola Bing Search API oyo AI Assistant asalelaka liboso.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: Equipe ezali kokoba koluka ndenge ya koleka mpo na ebongiseli ya privacy. Ba options nyonso nyonso basalelaka koluka ya Azure AI Foundry, kasi ndenge ya kokabola ba donn√©es ya lisolo ezali ndenge na ndenge.
